caption.p: Valganciclovir (VGCV) prevents mortality and mitigates Ad5- and Ad6-induced liver damage in immunosuppressed Syrian hamsters. ( A) Survival. Ad6-Vehicle v. Ad6-VGCV p = 0.0002 (Log rank); ( B) Body weight changes. Group means are shown only up to 6 days post challenge; after this point, the deaths in the Ad5-Vehicle and Ad6-Vehicle groups would confound group means. The error bars show the standard error of the mean; ( C) Serum alanine transaminase levels. Each symbol represents the value from an individual animal; the horizontal bar signifies the mean. Ad6-Vehicle v. Ad6-VGCV p = 0.0159, Ad5-Vehicle v. Ad5-VGCV p = 0.1111 (Mannâ€“Whitney U-test).
